casebody.data:
CHURCH
v.
DECKER 38P10-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 20, 2018 William W. Respess, Jr., Attorney at Law, Marshall Hurley, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Decker, Jean Marie (formerly Church). John Fletcher Church, for Church, John Fletcher. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 22nd of June 2018 by Plaintiff to Amend Petition: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of September 2018." Ervin, J. recused
